ygData.subject: Re: Exploring the windmills
ygData.msgSnippet: They are guides you have to ask a GM because guides are just players. ... From: Michael Bierce  To:  Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
They are guides you have to ask a GM because guides are just players.
----- Original Message -----
From: Michael Bierce <m_bierce@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, October 08, 1999 10:55 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Exploring the windmills


> From: "Michael Bierce" <m_bierce@...>
>
> I talked to several guides last night on the Xegony server and they all
told
> me that tinkering was NOT a broken skill. I ran this by them twice saying
> that a couple of the guides had said that some parts of it were broken and
> they told me that it was working fine. Just thought I would share that
info
> with you guys.
>
> Marcoux
>
> >
